                                                                                                                                                                                                                           am‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                           ple:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                               ds9
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               -unix
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               "/tmp/.IMT%d"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               unix_only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               use
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               IRAF
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               unix
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               socket
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               This
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               is
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               same
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               as
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               -fifo
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               none
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               -port
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               0.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   Syn‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   tax
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       -unix_only

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   Ex‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   am‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   ple:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       ds9
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       -unix_only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       update
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Up‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       dates
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       cur‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       rent
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       frame
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       or
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       re‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       gion
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       frame.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       In
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       sec‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       ond
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       form,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       first
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       ar‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       gu‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       ment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       is
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       num‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       ber
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       fits
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       HDU
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       (start‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       ing
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       with
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       1)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       and
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       re‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       main‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       ing
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       args
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       are
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       bound‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       ing
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       box
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       in
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       IM‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       AGE
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       co‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       or‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       di‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       nates.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       By
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       de‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       fault,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       screen
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       is
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       up‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       dated
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       next
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       avail‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       able
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       idle
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       cy‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       cle.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       How‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       ever,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       you
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       may
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       force
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       an
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       im‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       me‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       di‐
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       ate
